title: Appendix ‚Äî LLM Draft & Commentary
text:
Appendix ‚Äî LLM Draft & Commentary
Prompt used:
‚ÄúCreate an outline and sample text for a one-page MBA student portfolio.‚Äù
LLM Output (verbatim):
<paste the model‚Äôs outline + sample text here, unchanged>
My Commentary (what I used/changed and why): - Kept the section order but cut verbose parts to fit one page. - Rewrote the bio and bullets to reflect my actual roles/results. - Replaced generic skills with specific tools I use. - Adjusted tone to be more concise and action-oriented. - Ensured no claims are exaggerated; all facts are accurate.

title: MBA Portfolio

About
Numbers don‚Äôt have to be chaotic. I design calm, reliable finance workflows‚Äîclear reconciliations, tidy documentation, and reporting you can trust. I‚Äôm an MBA candidate at UCW with hands-on experience in busy finance teams, and I enjoy the mix of analysis, operations, and practical problem-solving.
Right now I‚Äôm looking for roles where I can keep the books clean, the process simple, and the team moving.
